### [01 — Fundraising Strategies](/projects/project1/)

<div class="project-meta">Statistical Significance Testing & Causal Analysis</div>

Quantified the effectiveness of matching grant interventions on charitable donation behavior. Applied rigorous hypothesis testing and multivariate regression to isolate treatment effects across demographic segments.

**Key Findings:**
- Matching grant treatment: +21.2% average donation lift
- Statistical significance: p = 0.045 (OLS regression)
- Effect persists after controlling for demographics

**Methodology:** T-tests, Multiple Linear Regression, Statistical Inference  
**Scale:** 4,000+ donor records with experimental treatment assignment

[Explore Analysis →](/projects/project1/)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [02 — Patent Holdings Prediction](/projects/project2/)

<div class="project-meta">Generalized Linear Modeling & Count Regression</div>

Developed predictive model for patent portfolio composition across geographic and demographic dimensions. Implemented Poisson regression to handle count-based outcome with overdispersion.

**Key Findings:**
- Regional variation accounts for 34% of model variance
- Age exhibits non-linear relationship with patent holdings
- Customer status significant predictor (p < 0.01)

**Methodology:** Poisson Regression, EDA, Distribution Analysis  
**Scale:** Patent registry data across multiple regions

[Explore Analysis →](/projects/project2/)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [03 — Consumer Preference Modeling](/projects/project3/)

<div class="project-meta">Conjoint Analysis & Discrete Choice Modeling</div>

Decomposed consumer preferences for product attributes through factorial experimental design. Identified price elasticity, feature importance weights, and willingness-to-pay across segments.

**Key Findings:**
- Price elasticity: -1.8 (moderately elastic)
- Attribute importance ranking via utility weights
- Segment-specific preference heterogeneity

**Methodology:** Conjoint Analysis, Preference Estimation  
**Scale:** Consumer choice experiments, 2,000+ respondents

[Explore Analysis →](/projects/project3/)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [04 — Business Drivers Analysis](/projects/project4/)

<div class="project-meta">Key Driver Regression & Impact Assessment</div>

Isolated primary performance drivers through multi-stage regression analysis. Quantified relative contribution of operational variables to outcome metrics using driver-based decomposition.

**Key Findings:**
- Top 3 drivers account for 68% of outcome variance
- Driver interaction effects identified and modeled
- Actionable prioritization for resource allocation

**Methodology:** Key Driver Regression, Sensitivity Analysis  
**Scale:** Multi-dimensional operational dataset

[Explore Analysis →](/projects/project4/)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [05 — Multi-Source Data Integration](/projects/Project5/)

<div class="project-meta">Comparative EDA & Statistical Summaries</div>

Synthesized exploratory analysis across three curated datasets to identify structural patterns, distributions, and inter-variable relationships. Applied statistical tests for normality, correlation, and group differences.

**Key Findings:**
- Comprehensive descriptive statistics and visualizations
- Distribution characteristics (skewness, kurtosis)
- Comparative patterns across datasets

**Methodology:** EDA, Distribution Analysis, Statistical Summaries  
**Datasets:** Iris Measurements, Palmer Penguins, Yogurt Preferences

[Explore Analysis →](/projects/Project5/)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [06 — Qualcomm Strategic Analysis](/projects/project6/)

<div class="project-meta">Enterprise Strategic Analysis & Financial Modeling</div>

Comprehensive organizational assessment integrating market intelligence, financial performance analysis, and operational metrics. Developed actionable recommendations for strategic positioning and performance optimization.

**Key Deliverables:**
- Executive presentation with strategic recommendations
- Detailed financial and operational analysis
- Competitive benchmarking and market positioning

**Methodology:** Strategic Analysis, Financial Modeling, Comparative Benchmarking  
**Scope:** Multi-dimensional organizational and market review

[Explore Analysis →](/projects/project6/)
:::
